EForm.Description: Child of Meeting, Action, Contract, Procurement, Evaluation

SystemColumn.Formula: COALESCE([Action], "No Action Description") & IF( [Date Due] <> NULL(), " - Due: " & [Date Due] ) & IF( [Responsible Person Display Name] <> NULL(), " - Assignee: " & [Responsible Person Display Name] )

Column.Name: Action
Column.ValidationFormula:
IF( AND(ISBLANK($thisValue), [Temp] = "Selected from templated action"), "A templated action must be selected",
ISBLANK($thisValue), "An action name must be entered",
NULL )

Column.Name: Notes Processor
Root Record
Root Description
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Description", [Root EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Root RecordID], "LineNumber", 1) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Parent Description
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( "Description", ARRAY_FIRST([Parent Record]), HASH("RecordID", ARRAY_LAST([Parent Record])) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Target Data
Column.Formula: IFERROR( DB_LOOKUP( ARRAY("Action", "Responsible Text", "Date Due"), [Target EFormType], HASH("RecordID", [Target RecordID]) ), NULL() )

Column.Name: Responsible Text
Column.Formula:
IF( [Custom Responsible] = TRUE, [Responsible Custom Text],
ARRAY_JOIN( ARRAY_SELECT( [Responsible], $(i,item) EBMS_GET_ROLE_DISPLAYNAME($item) ), ", " ) )

Column.Name: Action Number
Frequency - Follow-on Task Creation Date
Frequency - Follow-on Task Due Date
Notify Email Addresses
Parent Structure
Type
Column.Formula:
IF( [Type] <> NULL, [Type],
[RecordID] > 0, "New action",
AND( [RecordID] < 0, [Templated Actions Exist] <> TRUE ), "New action" )

Column.Name: Documentation Line Exists
Column.Formula: IF( [Document Name] <> NULL(), TRUE, [Documentation Line Exists] )

Binding.Expression: "This action originated from " & IF( [Root EFormType] = "Meeting", [Root Description], [Root EFormType] & " (ID:" & [Root RecordID] & ") - " & [Root Description] )

Label.Text: Description of the parent of the action
How would you like to add an action?
How often the action will be raised
Context date the frequency above is based on

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Type] = "Selected from templated action", [Templated Frequency Type] = "Reoccurring", ISBLANK([Action]) )

Label.Text: Enter a name for the action
Enter the details of the action

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Type] = "New action", [Created From Template] = TRUE ) )

Label.Text: What is the priority of this action?

Information.Text: Changing status will send a notification to any listed interested parties.

Label.Text: Select the current status of this action

Binding.Expression: AND( [Type] <> NULL, [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Type] = "New action", [Created From Template] = TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Enter the date this action was completed
Enter any closure notes for this action
Select the person(s) responsible for completing this action

Binding.Expression: AND( [Type] <> NULL, [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Type] = "New action", [Created From Template] = TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Send email to the responsible person(s)
Enter any additional comments regarding the action
Select any other person(s) who are interested in this action

Binding.Expression:
LET $base := ARRAY( "Everyone", "Originator, Assigned, and Interested", IF(ARRAY_FIRST([Parent Record]) = "Meeting", "Meeting Invitees") );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($base, $(i,item) $item <> NULL())
AND( [Type] <> NULL, [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Type] = "New action", [Created From Template] = TRUE ) )

Label.Text: How frequent the action will be raised

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

An action can be reoccurring or once-off.

"

Label.Text: How often the action will be raised
Context date the frequency above is based on
Grace period for a task to be actioned

Title.Text: Date the task will be created, calculated from the task due date plus frequency

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

The following dates are calculated based on frequency setup.

"

Title.Text: History of recurring actions created since the original action

TextCriterion.Text: [Local].[Root Recurring Action RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY
[Root Recurring Action RecordID] = [Local].[Root Recurring Action RecordID] OR [RecordID] = [Local].[Root Recurring Action RecordID]

Label.Text: Enter a name for the sub-action
Select the person(s) responsible for completing the sub-action

RichLabel.Text:
<html>
<head>
	<title></title>
</head>
<body>
<style type="text/css">/* CSS talk bubble */
.talk-bubble {
	margin: 40px;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
	width: 200px;
	height: auto;
	background-color: lightyellow;
}
.border{
  border: 8px solid #666;
}
.round{
  border-radius: 30px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 30px;
	-moz-border-radius: 30px;

}

/* Right triangle placed top left flush. */
.tri-right.border.left-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, left side slightly down */
.tri-right.border.left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -40px;
	right: auto;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: -20px;
	right: auto;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom left side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-left-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 30px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.btm-left-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
	left: 38px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 30px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 38px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}
/*
	left: -8px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent #666;
	left: 0px;
  right: auto;
  top: auto;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 22px solid;
	border-color: transparent transparent transparent lightyellow;

/*Right triangle, placed bottom right side slightly in*/
.tri-right.border.btm-right:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -8px;
	bottom: -40px;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 #666 transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.btm-right:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: 0px;
	bottom: -20px;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow lightyellow transparent transparent;
}

/* Right triangle, right side slightly down*/
.tri-right.border.right-in:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: 30px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent #666;
}
.tri-right.right-in:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 38px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 12px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent lightyellow;
}

/* Right triangle placed top right flush. */
.tri-right.border.right-top:before {
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -40px;
  top: -8px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 32px solid;
	border-color: #666 transparent transparent transparent;
}
.tri-right.right-top:after{
	content: ' ';
	position: absolute;
	width: 0;
	height: 0;
  left: auto;
	right: -20px;
  top: 0px;
	bottom: auto;
	border: 20px solid;
	border-color: lightyellow transparent transparent transparent;
}

/* talk bubble contents */
.talktext{
  padding: 1em;
	text-align: left;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
.talktext p{
  /* remove webkit p margins */
  -webkit-margin-before: 0em;
  -webkit-margin-after: 0em;
}
</style>
</body>
</html>

Label.Text: On submission, send an email to reponsible person(s) and interested parties
Send an email to individuals to request information or inform them on updates related to this action.

Title.Text: Select any additional specific users you wish to notify
Summary of the email addresses for all recipients of this update
Enter the content for the email update
Select which users on this action you would like to notify

Label.Text: Upload or manage any attachments relevant to this action

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Document Upload] == TRUE, OR( [Type] = "New action", [Created From Template] = TRUE ) )

FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.FieldValuesFormula: HASH( "Action", [Action], "Details", [Details], "Frequency Type", [Frequency Type], "Frequency", [Frequency], "Frequency Measure", [Frequency Measure], "Frequency Context Date", [Frequency Context Date], "Type", "Template" )
FormulaDrivenRaiseLinkedEForm.Description: Duplicate Action record to create a template of this action

CheckBox.Text: Do you want to save this action as a template?

Information.Text: Templating the action will allow users to create a copy of the task in future, as needed.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Created From Template] <> TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mappings], "Administrators") > 0, [Navigation] = "Details", OR( [Temp] = "New action", NOT(ISBLANK([Action])) ) )

Label.Text: This action was initially created from a templated action. Click below to view the template action details.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Created From Template] = TRUE, ARRAY_INDEXOF([User to Group Mappings], "Administrators") > 0, [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Templated Action RecordID])) )

Label.Text: Updating the details of an existing action template will not automatically change actions created from it.

Binding.Expression:
"
"

Label.Text: The default name for actions created from this template
A default summary or details for the templates created from this action
How frequent the action will be raised

Binding.Expression:
"
"

"

An action can be reoccurring or once-off.

"

Label.Text: How often the action will be raised
Context date the frequency above is based on
Would you like to use this templated action?

TextCriterion.Text: CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

CASE
--ccheck if type is template & if so give everyone read access WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Template' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
-- Check if access is set to everyone WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone'
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Interested Parties]) THEN TRUE
--Check if access is set to Meeting Invitees WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Meeting Invitees' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Meeting Invitees])
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END

CASE
WHEN [Type] = 'Template' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
WHEN [Type] <> 'Template' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone'
ELSE FALSE
END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])
CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'
STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] GET COUNT(1) > 0
(STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(1)) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers'
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])

CASE
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check if the Action is a template, & if true give everyone read access WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Template' AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' THEN TRUE
--check that the root eform isn't a contract/FOI request. If not, these users should always have access WHEN [Root EFormType] <> 'Contract' AND [Root EFormType] <> 'Information Request' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Interested Parties]) THEN TRUE
--for Information Requests, these users should have access to any action WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Information Request Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Paralegals' ) THEN TRUE
--check the root Information Request for the Assigned Officer WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' THEN ( STEP TO [Information Request] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--Check if access is set to Meeting Invitees WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Meeting Invitees' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Meeting Invitees])
--Check if access is set to Everyone WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone' THEN ( CASE --check if the source record is a Meeting WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Meeting' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Meeting Invitees])
--check if the source record is an Action WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Action' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Action] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([To].[Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([To].[Interested Parties]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if root parent record is a Contract WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a contract role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the Contract is not restricted - if not, the following users can access in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if root parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER),[To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if root parent record is a EVALUATION WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO [Evaluation] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) ELSE FALSE
END )
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END

CASE --Check if type is template - if true only admins have write access WHEN [Type] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Template' THEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators'
--check if user is in group always granted access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
--check if user is in assignment on record - these users always have access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([Interested Parties]) THEN TRUE
--for Information Requests, these users should have access to any action WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Information Request Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Paralegals' ) THEN TRUE
--check the root Information Request for the Assigned Officer WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Information Request' THEN ( STEP TO [Information Request] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--Check if access is set to Everyone WHEN [Access] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Everyone' THEN ( CASE
--check if the source record is an Action WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Action' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Action] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([To].[Responsible]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY ([To].[Interested Parties]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if root parent record is a Contract WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' THEN ( STEP TO [Contract] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
--check if root parent record is a Procurement WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' THEN ( STEP TO [Procurement] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) --check if root parent record is a EVALUATION WHEN [Root EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Evaluation' THEN ( STEP TO [Evaluation] ON [Root RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) ELSE FALSE
END )
--return false if no requirements met ELSE FALSE
END
CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Interested Parties]) OR CURRENT_USER FAST_EQUAL_TO [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ARRAY([Responsible])
